title: My account was permanently suspended for no reason?? Pls help
body: So i was playing league sunday, just playing some solo queue trying to gain some elo and then i leave to go out to eat with my family because it was mothers day. I come home to log in and see i was permanently suspended? It said i was banned until  Fri Jan 01 00:00:00 UTC 2100. I see in the forums that 2100 is something with account security compromise? I have never gave anybody my account information. I got a notification like 3 days ago that it said somebody tried to log in to my account or somebody did log in to my account? Soon as i got that i changed my password.  Nobody has been on my account to my knowledge but ive spent way to much time and money on this game to be banned for no reason. Please help me i already opened a support ticket but it's been 24 hours and I havent gotten a reply.

replies.body:
I've got your account and ticket pulled up now, and it looks like someone may have been able to get on your account without your permission. We wouldn't want them to do too much damage while they were there, so your account was locked to help keep it safe. 

We'll be able to help you in your ticket, but I noticed you've replied a few times before we were able to get to it. Each time you respond without us seeing it, your ticket will get bumped further back in line =\ . Try to wait for their response, and you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
Thank you so much I really appreciate it. I really didn't want to have to make a new account. I appreciate it and can't wait to be playing again.
